活动-中型群居动物:驯鹿、牛、公牛、驯鹿: 躲避一只游荡的山狮 Avoiding a rambling Mountain Lion
正在啃食低矮树枝上的嫩叶 Browsing tender Leaves on low branches
咀嚼干燥的细枝和带刺的茎秆 Chewing on dry twigs and thorny stems
聚集在喂养它们的矮人牧场主周围 Congregating around the Dwarf Ranchers who feed them
小心地穿越溪流，警惕着可能的伏击 Crossing a stream carefully, wary of ambush
在水坑边饮水，对捕食者浑然不觉 Drinking at a watering hole, oblivious to predators
围绕幼崽进行防御性包围，同时一只巨魔正垂涎欲滴 Encircling their young defensively, as a Troll salivates
在凉爽的空气中呼出蒸汽 Exhaling plumes of steam in the cool air
用甩动的尾巴驱赶顽固的苍蝇 Fanning away persistent flies with flicking tails
温顺地跟随在一名半人马游侠身后 Following obediently behind a Centaur Ranger
受惊后四处狂奔 Galloping wildly in all directions after being spooked
正在大嚼脆生生的落梨 Gorging on crunchy fallen Pears
在一位恼怒的树人身上磨砺它们的角 Honing their horns on an exasperated Treant
在狂风中挤在一起取暖 Huddling together against a blustery wind
在滑坡后沿着险峻的山脊缓慢行进 Loping along a treacherous ridge after a landslide
被兽人箭矢击中后，大声吼叫 Loudly bellowing after being struck by Orc Arrows
正在啃食美丽野花的嫩芽顶端 Munching on the tender tops of beautiful Wildflowers
好奇地啃食着一些矮小的蘑菇 Nibbling inquisitively on some squat Mushrooms
反刍着干燥且营养贫瘠的草料 Ruminating on dry, nutrient poor grasses
发情期使雄性动物格外暴躁 Rutting season has made the Males extra ornery
一群受惊的狂战士正被兽群踩踏 Stampeding a group of surprised Berserkers
跺脚发出警告，随后向一头恐狼发起冲锋 Stomping a warning, prior to charging a Dire Wolf
误入农夫的田地，大快朵颐地享用生菜 Straying into a Farmer's fields to feast on Lettuce
围绕着一头正在产犊的母牛，进行保护性围护 Surrounding a Calving Cow protectively
快步小跑，以重新加入一个异常庞大的兽群 Trotting swiftly to rejoin an exceptionally large herd
在厚厚的黑泥中艰难跋涉，泥浆没至脚踝 Trudging in thick black mud, up to their ankles
凶猛地用角顶撞一名尼安德特猎人 Viciously goring a Neanderthal Hunter
在逐渐干涸的池塘中打滚，以驱赶叮咬的昆虫 Wallowing in a drying pond to keep away biting bugs
在失去首领后漫无目的地游荡 Wandering aimlessly after the loss of their Leader
翠绿的山谷中回荡着口哨声 Whistling echoes throughout a verdant valley
